title: How to streamline your wardrobe: the 10 essentials that every woman needs
text:
When Thomas Cook buckled last month there was a surge in worn flight attendant tights being traded on eBay.

I am not making this up.

I highlight this curious tale to illustrate that there is no object so humble or weird that it will not find a market somewhere. See how there is a silver (or American Tan) lining to most events. If only Thomas Cook’s management had shown as much entrepreneurial flair as the cabin crew.

This is a very good time to go through the humble, the weird and the what-was-I-thinking? things in your sartorial stock. The clocks go back tonight. The weather’s making the average park look like the Somme.

Put baldly, you have nothing better to do. It’s that lovely calendar hiatus...
description: When Thomas Cook buckled last month there was a surge in worn flight attendant tights being traded on eBay.
